item.title: RRDCH: CDE programme on “Current trends in all ceramic restorations”

Continue reading "RRDCH: CDE programme on “Current trends in all ceramic restorations”"
item.content:encoded:
CDE programme was conducted in Rajarajeswari Dental College by Department of Prosthodontics on 15th February 2013, with the theme “Current trends in all ceramic restorations”.

The organising committee included
Advisors: Dr. Edwin Devadoss Dean; Dr. Savita S. Principal; Dr, Harish P.V, H.O.D PROSTHODONTICS

Convener: Dr. Ramesh T. R.

Co-ordinator: Dr, Gangaiah M.

Treasurer: Dr. Chandrashekar S.

Registration committee: Dr. Parimala B. K.; Dr. Shweta Poovani; Dr. Ravikumar B. J.

Food committee: Dr. Nandakishore B.; Dr. Krishna Kumar U.

The speakers of the day were

1. Dr. Chetan Hedge – Patient selection and restoration selection

2. Dr. Shivashankar M. – All ceramic materials and processing

3. Dr. Srivasta G. – Bonding and clinical success of all ceramic
Restorations

4. Dr. Harish P. V. – Tooth preparation for all ceramic restoration

The programme was patronized by chairman of RRDC and Dean Dr. Edwin Devdoss. Programme preceded by respected Principal Dr. S. Savita. 291 delegates from various parts of Bangalore, and Karnataka attended the programme, which included teaching faculty, students, post graduates, and general practitioners.

The programme enlightened the delegates about all ceramic restorations. The programme schedule started from 8:30 AM with the registration followed by inauguration. From 9:30 AM the lecture session begun and continued till 4:00 PM.

The programme concluded with panel discussion. The speakers were felicitated and appreciation certificates were handed over by the principal and staff. The programme was approved by Karnataka State Dental Council and carried 4 credit points. The certificates were distributed to the delegates at the end of the programme by KSDC representatives.
